comment._content: State Records holds a collection of Aerial Photgraphs c.1936-1980. In order to view these you will have to visit our Western Sydney Records Centre.

comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: I like the token tram, heading east with its rear pole up, on Gardiners Road.......and how Banks Ave was to become the major thoroughfare, with trams.  That role fell to Bunnerong Road, at left, and with buses!
